headline: PG&E Unveils $73B Plan to Power AI Data Centers and Upgrade Grid by 2030
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the best stocks to buy under $20. On September 29, PG&E Corporation announced a plan to spend $73 billion by 2030 on transmission upgrades. This major investment is intended to address the surge in electricity demand, primarily driven by data centers and the increased adoption of artificial intelligence. The […]

headline: A Look at PG&E's Valuation Following Fitch Upgrade and New Wildfire Risk Measures
summary: Fitch Ratings has upgraded PG&E (NYSE:PCG) to investment grade, highlighting recent successes in reducing wildfire risks and bolstering financial stability. This move has drawn attention from investors given the material implications for PG&E’s balance sheet. Key drivers behind this upgrade include completion of 1,000 miles of underground powerlines in high fire risk regions and the passage of California Senate Bill 254, which further strengthens protections against wildfire-related...
